channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The U.S. economy is propped up by three pillars, top investor Peter Boockvar says—and America’s growth now hinges on the wealthiest 10%
item.description: Consumer spending is anemic except among the richest, while Republican budget proposals threaten to end much of the government spending that’s been a ...

item.title: How the Trump admin transformed the U.S. into the financial Wild West in a matter of weeks
item.description: America’s sad departure from its position as anti-corruption king will have seismic effects.

item.title: Elon Musk’s DOGE is a cybersecurity threat in the making, former DHHS chief information officer says
item.description: “This is not a technology problem, this is a process problem,” said Scott Cory, a former chief information officer in one of the Department of Health ...

item.title: Exclusive: Two Instacart alumni raise $5.5 million to build Highstock, an eBay for big brands with excess inventory
item.description: Highstock connects brands' overstock inventory with buyers around the world.

item.title: Trump has a path to killing the Fed’s independence. How this unofficial norm came to exist
item.description: The Supreme Court could overturn precedent that protects chair Jerome Powell from being fired.
